She is the first one going from right to left, is wearing a pink sweatshirt and is also holding a Fondo Esperanza sign.  She works selling firewood by the sack, which she has been doing for four years.  She buys her merchandise in places that have a good amount of firewood and reasonable prices.  Then she pays for freight to transport it to her home.  After purchasing the firewood, she chops it and distributes it into sacks, in order to later offer it for sale and sell it.  Her customers come to her home to make their purchases, and she has a sufficient client base.

With the loan, she will buy a large quantity of firewood that will last her for one to two months.

Her goals are to have a large warehouse from where she can offer a large quantity of firewood, so that the wood does not rot.

She lives with her husband and three children aged 13, 6, and 4, who all attend school.  Her dreams are to become a micro-enterprise, and that her children become professionals.  Her motivation for continuing in her business is to pay for higher education for her children.

Leonor is very happy and grateful for the loan offered by Fondo Esperanza.  In addition, she say that she feels comfortable at the Communal Bank meetings, thanks to the companionship, trust, commitment and respect of the group.

Temuco is the capital of the Araucanía region.  The city is located 670 kilometers south of Santiago (the capital of Chile).  There are a number of lake resorts in the surrounding area, and a lot of very striking flora and fauna which are concentrated in the nearby national parks.  It is worth mentioning that 50% of the Mapuches, an indigenous people from our country, live in this region.

loans.use: to buy a large amount of firewood that will last her for one to two months.

loans.name: Juan Alfredo

texts.es:
El señor Juan Alfredo es casado, tiene 36 años de edad, estudio los estudios de educación primaria, se dedica a la artesanía al tejido de cortes típicos, servilletas, etc, inicia este negocio como operario y hasta el momento tiene 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica al mismo oficio.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá ampliar su capital de trabajo, en esta ocasión para la compra de hilo de diferentes clase y colores, en el futuro espera que su negocio sea grande y productivo.
texts.en:
Juan Alfredo is 30, and married. He has a primary school education. Juan Alfredo makes handicrafts such as traditional hand-woven fabrics, decorative serving cloths etc.  

He began this business as an operator, and to this point, has 3 years of experience  He has the support of his wife, who works in the same trade.

He has decided to apply for a loan in order to increase his working capital, in this case to buy thread of different kinds and colors. In the future he hopes that his business will be large and productive.

loans.use: To buy thread for weaving.

loans.name: Tierra Fertil (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El Banco comunal Tierra Fertil está formado por 10 socias y 2 socios quienes viven por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle, esta parroquia se caracteriza por la belleza natural de sus paisajes, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales, agricultura y muchos sale por la mañana y regresa por la noche de sus trabajos en la ciudad. La gente de la parroquia del Valle mantiene su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres.

Nuestras socias son personas muy alegres y trabajadoras, laboran en distintas actividades que les permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares  y salir adelante con sus familias.

Una de las socias es la Señorita. Alexandra, vive por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle, tiene 27 años, es madre soltera de un niño de 3 años de edad. Vive con sus padres, su padre es empleado público y su madre se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, la casa en la que habitan es propia.
 
Nuestra socia labora como empleada pública, trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 3 de la tarde, en su tiempo libre se dedica a la venta de bisutería la misma que vende a sus amigas y conocidas.

En el banco comunal se encuentra en su segundo crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de bisutería para aumentar su mercadería.
 
Su sueño es viajar por el mundo.

Las dos fotos pequeñas adjuntas son de dos socias y un socio que por motivos personales no pudieron estar presentes cuando se tomó la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Tierra Fertil" is made up of 10 members, 2 of whom live on the outskirts of Valle parish.  This parish is known for the natural beauty of its countryside. Its people work in retail trade, animal husbandry and agriculture.  Many of them go out in the morning and return from their work each evening to the city.   The people of Valle parish maintain their culture and the traditions of their parents.

The members of this group are very cheerful and hardworking.  They work in a variety of businesses that allow them to contribute to their households economically and get ahead with their families.

One of these members is Alexandra, who lives on the outskirts of Valle parish.  She is 27 years old and is a single mother with a 3 year-old child.  She lives with her parents in her parent's house; her father is a government employee and her mother is a housewife.  

Alexandra works as a government employee.  She works Monday through Friday from 7am until 3pm.  In her free time, she has a business selling costume jewelry to her friends and acquaintances.

This is her second loan cycle with her communal bank, and she will use the proceeds of this loan to buy costume jewelry so she can have more merchandise to sell.

Her dream is to travel the world.

The two small photos attached above are of two of the female members and one of the male members who, for personal reasons, could not be present when the group photo was taken.

loans.use: to buy costume jewelry

loans.name: Domingo Gusman

texts.es: Domingo Gusman tiene 40 años de edad, es caficultor, casado y tiene cuatro hijos entre las edades de 13 y 4 años, y junto a ellos reside en la comunidad de El Guineo #2 en el municipio de Patuca. Don Domingo no es originario de Patuca, él llegó a vivir a ese lugar sin practicamente nada de dinero en su bolsillo, apenas le alcanzó para comprar un pequeño solar y hacer una chozita y vivir en ella. Luego buscó trabajo como jornalero y con lo poco que ganaba iba apartando para comprar las plantas de café y asi comenzar a cultivar en su solarcito. Ahora don Domingo cuenta con su propio cultivo y afortunadamente le va bien porque al salir la produccion la vende rapidamente. El prestamo que esta solicitando don Domingo lo necesita para comprar melaza, fertilizantes, y para pagar la mano de obra por la chapia de la tierra para el cultivo. Con el apoyo del prestamo su produccion estara asistida y tambien obtendra alguna ganancia para seguir cubriendo el sostenimiento de su hogar y los gastos medicos de uno de sus hijos ya que padece de Leucemia y aunque son caros, su esposa y él siempre hacen la lucha para que su hijo no se deje vencer por esa enfermedad. Su meta es convertirse en un gran productor de café y darle una mejor vida a su familia, especialmente a su hijo enfermo. Este es su primer ciclo en FAMA y confia en Dios que pagará al dia sus cuotas para que asi la institucion lo siga apoyando con mas prestamos.
texts.en:
Domingo Gusman is 40, a coffee grower who is married and has four children between the ages of 4 and 13 years old. Together they live in El Guineo neighborhood #2 in Patuca municipality.

Domingo is not a native of Patuca. He arrived here with practically no money in his pocket and with scarcely enough to buy a small piece a land and build a small hut on it to live in. Then he looked for work as a day laborer and little by little he earned enough to buy coffee plants and thereby begin cultivating his own plot of land. Now Domingo has his own crop and fortunately it is going well because as soon as he harvests his coffee he sells it quickly.  He is requesting a loan to buy molasses, fertilizer and to pay a labor force to clear his land for cultivation.  This loan will help him with his coffee production and also to earn a small profit so he can continue to cover his household expenses as well as the medical costs for one of his children who has leukemia. Although these medical costs are high, his wife and he will never stop fighting to prevent their son from succumbing to this disease.

Domingo’s goal is to become a large scale coffee producer and to provide a better life for his family, especially for his ill son. This is his first loan from FAMA and he is confident that with God’s help he will make his payments on time so that the organization will continue to support him with more loans.

loans.use: to buy molasses, fertilizer and pay his labor force.

loans.name: Alfonso Alejandro

texts.es:
El joven Alfonso Alejandro, es soltero, tiene 23 años de edad, curso los estudios de educación básica, se dedica a la artesanía, inicio este negocio gracias a su padres que lo apoyaron y hasta el momento lleva 2 años de experiencia.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para comprar hilo de diferentes colores y clase y un telar para tejeduría, ya que quiere tener su negocio propio y contar con su propio telar, para mejorar su condición de vida y la de sus padres.
texts.en: Alfonso Alejandro is a 23 year old, single young man.  He finished his primary education and now works as a craftsman.  He started this business thanks to his parents who gave him the support he needed.  He has 2  years of experience in this trade.  He is requesting a loan to buy different types and colors of yarn and a loom to do his weaving.   He wants to have his own business and his own loom so that he can improve his living conditions and that of his parents.

loans.use: purchase yarn and a loom.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María es socia del  Banco Comunal “Mujeres al Progreso de Juli”, ubicado en el distrito de Juli, provincia Chucuito, departamento de Puno, tiene 31 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos.  Cuenta con educación primaria.
Desde hace un año trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo inicial fue de S/. 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio de venta de artesanías.
La señora tiene una tienda de bordados, tejidos y teñidos, también se dedica a la crianza de ganados como ovinos, vacunos y porcinos.
Este nuevo préstamo de S/. 1900.00 nuevo soles, lo invertirá en la compra de golosinas, siete cajas de galletas y siete jabas de gaseosas para venderlos en las ferias, piensa aprovechar y así generar otros ingresos. También piensa invertir en la compra de lanas para su artesanía.
Su esposo trabaja en la venta de zapatos. Su sueño es mejorar su casa y mejorar los ganados para conseguir más ganancia.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y la responsabilidad de las socias.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the communal bank "Mujeres al Progreso de Juli," which is located in the Juli district, in the province of Chucuito and the department of Puno. She is 31 years old. She lives with her partner and has 2 children. She went to primary school.

She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for a year. Her first loan was for 300 PEN, and she invested the money in her business, which is selling handicrafts.

She has a shop where she sells embroidery, weavings, and dyed items. She also raises animals such as sheep, cattle, and pigs.

She will invest this new loan of 1900 PEN in the purchase of candy, seven boxes of crackers, and seven crates of soft drinks to sell at the fairs. She is thinking of making good use of these opportunities and thus having another source of income. She is also thinking of buying more wool for her handicrafts.

Her husband sells shoes. Her dream is to improve her house and improve their livestock to obtain more earnings.

What she likes about the communal bank is the punctuality and responsibility of the members.

loans.use: to buy candy, seven boxes of crackers, and seven crates of soft drinks to sell, and to buy wool in various colors for her handicrafts business

loans.name: El Aguacate (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal El Aguacate está formado por 7 mujeres y 2 hombres quienes viven por el sector de Monay en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad  es muy visitada por su belleza arquitectónica, por su gente y sus tradiciones. La gastronomía típica de esta ciudad deleita el paladar de propios y extraños. Su gente es muy amable, mantienen sus costumbres y tradiciones.  Nuestras socias son personas trabajadoras que luchan día a día para sacar adelante a sus familias, laboran en diferentes actividades en la ciudad de Cuenca.

Una de las socias es la Señora. Mercedes, vive por el sector de Monay y se encuentra en su cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal.
 
Tiene 63 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 5 hijos quienes son  mayores de edad, cuatro son casados e independientes  y uno trabaja y le ayuda  económicamente. Su esposo le ayuda en casa, la casa en la que vive es propia siendo el resultado del esfuerzo y trabajo en su juventud.

Doña Mercedes se dedica a la cría de animales como: cerdos, gallinas y cuyes, también labora en la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para su consumo y para la venta.
  
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerdos, cuyes y gallinas.
 
Su meta es tener más animales para la cría y venta.
texts.en:
The communal bank El Aguacate is made up of 7 women and 2 men who live in the Monay neighborhood in the city of Cuenca.  This city is frequently visited for its architectural beauty, its people and its traditions.  The city's traditional cuisine delights the palates of residents and visitors alike.  Its people are friendly and maintain their customs and traditions.  Our members are hard-working people that strive daily to provide for their families.  They all work in different activities in the city of Cuenca.  

One of these members is Señora Mercedes.  She lives in the Monay neighborhood and this is her fourth loan with the communal bank.
 
She is 63 years old, married and the fruit of their conjugal union has brought them 5 children who are now adults.  Four of them are married and independent and one works and helps them financially.  Her husband helps around the house.  Their house is their own and is the result of their effort and hard work when they were young.  

Doña Mercedes raises animals such as pigs, chickens and guinea pigs.  She also works in agriculture and what she grows is for their consumption and to sell.  
  
With this new loan she will buy pigs, chickens and guinea pigs. 
 
Her goal is to have more animals to raise and sell.

loans.use: purchase pigs, chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Senor De Huarancayo Group

texts.es:
LA SRA RUTH DINA D. 45 AÑOS D. EDAD,CONVIVIENTE,TIENE  01 HIJO D. 16 AÑOS D. EDAD. RUTH ES SOCIA DEL GRUPO SEÑOR D. HUARANCAYO SE DEDICA  ACTUALMENTE A LA VENTA D. PANADERIA Y PASTELERIA, RUTH SOLICITO EL PRESTAMO PARA PODER COMPRAR MAS MERCADERIA COMO ARINA D. TRIGO, LEVADURA Y OTROS, RUTH TIENES SU OBJETIVO EN EL FUTURO COMPRAR UN HORNO INDUSTRIAL Y ASI PRODUCIR  MAS PANES Y A LA VES INCREMENTAR LA DEMANDA D. CLIENTES.

SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA LA CUARTA PERSONA LADO DERECHA VISTE CON CHOMPA COLOR ROSADO Y CHALECO COLOR MORADO.
texts.en: Ruth, 45, lives with a partner and has a 16 year-old child.  Ruth is a member of the group "Senor D. Huarancayo."  She, along with her group, is committed to making her upcoming payments on time.  Ruth has a bakery where she sells breads and pastires.  Ruth is requesting this loan so that she can buy more merchandise such as wheat flour, yeast, among others.  In the future, Ruth would like to buy another oven so that she could produce more bread and increase her income.  Ruth is found at the back of the picture, to the left of the woman wearing a red sweater.  Ruth is wearing a pink sweater with a purple vest.

loans.use: to purchase baking supplies, such as wheat flour and yeast

loans.name: Edis

texts.es: Edis tiene 33 años, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en una casa alquilada. El negocio al que se dedica es la venta de jugos de frutas, en un pequeño puesto en la calle, para ello cuenta con un stand rustico móvil, para poder trasladarse a diversos puntos de su localidad. Esta actividad lo viene realizando hace 5 años y en ella encontró estabilidad económica. Asimismo menciona que dentro de este negocio también ofrece bebidas calientes como café  o mates que son del agrado de su público consumidor. Ella considera que este trabajo  es rentable es por esta razón que se ha mantenido durante este tiempo con la mentalidad de mejorar y ampliar su negocio y al fin encontrar un lugar done establecerse. Es la segunda oportunidad que solicita un crédito con MFP. Cuando tuvo su  primer ciclo de préstamo de manera grupal ha demostrado la puntualidad de sus pagos  y se ha ganado la confianza de los demás integrantes de su grupo solidario. En esta ocasión, con el dinero que solicita,  podrá comprar insumos y productos para no dejar de vender jugos y mates calientes.
texts.en:
Edis is 33 years old; she lives with her husband and two children in a rented home.  

The business she works in is selling fruit juice from a small stand in the street.  She has a rustic mobile cart, so as to be able to transport it to different parts of the area.  She has been doing this for five years, and through it she has achieved financial stability.  She also mentions that within this business she also offers hot drinks such as coffee or mate (a traditional drink), which are pleasing to the consuming public.  She considers this work to be profitable, and it is for this reason that she has continued with it for this period of time, with the thought of improving and growing her business, and ultimately finding a location where she can set herself up.  

This is her second opportunity to request a loan through MFP.  When she took part in her first lending cycle as part of the group, she demonstrated punctuality in her repayments, and she has earned the trust of the other members of the solidarity group.  On this occasion, with the money that she is requesting, she will buy ingredients and products so as not to stop selling juices and hot mates.

loans.use: to buy fruits and ingredients.

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.es: Jacinto tiene 43 años, es padre de 3 niños y vive al lado de su esposa en casa una alquilada. Como jefe de familia decidió emprender diversas actividades para generar los ingresos necesarios, fue así que ha desarrollado múltiples oficios y en una de ellas  ha descubierto que es rentable  el reciclaje, desde entonces recolecta productos en desuso como: botellas de plásticos, diversos envases para venderlos por kilos, del mismo modo vende papeles y cartones según recolecte en los días libres que tiene. Por otro lado trabaja de manera dependiente como obrero de construcción de casas de material noble, por lo que también recibe un ingreso considerable. Jacinto sueña con tener algún día una casa propia y darle toda la comodidad a su familia por ello continuará trabajando. Decidió trabajar con MFP por las buenas referencias que ha recibido de sus vecinos que le informaron sobre los beneficios de trabajar de manera grupal a la cual se animó a formar parte de este grupo. Ahora tiene muchas expectativas positivas y se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará una moto triciclo que le ayudará a transportar todos los envases reciclables que recolecte en las calles.
texts.en:
Jacinto, age 43, has three children.  He lives with his wife in a rented house.  As head of the family he decided to undertake diverse business activities in order to generate the necessary income.  That is how he has developed multiple trades.  One of them that he has discovered to be profitable is recycling.

Since then he collects products that are no longer used such as plastic bottles and various cans.  He sells them by the kilo.  Similarly, he sells paper and cartons in accordance with what he collects on his days off. 

In addition, he is an employee who works building solid construction houses.  He receives considerable income for that work.

Jacinto dreams of one day having his own house and giving his family all of the comforts.  He will continue working for that.

He decided to work with MFP because of the good references he got from his neighbors.  They told him about the benefits of working as a group, and this encouraged him to become part of this group.  He now has many positive expectations, and he pledges to make his payments punctually.  

He will use the requested loan to buy a “moto triciclo” (a three wheeled motorized vehicle) to transport all of the recyclable containers that he gathers from the streets.

loans.use: to buy a “moto triciclo” (a three wheeled motorized vehicle).

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
This is 39 year-old Fatmata.  She is married, and has 3 children, aged 5, 9 and 12 years. She has one additional dependent, who lives with her because of schooling.  In 1999, Fatmata established her groundnut business. She had been a backyard farmer and was able to access funds from her garden to begin trade in  groundnuts.  Working 7 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 890,000 every month from this business. 

She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000.   Fatmata has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now needs a new loan in order to buy 25 bags of groundnuts. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le260,000.  In the future, Fatmata plans to open another store to supply retailers and educate her children to the level they wish to attain. The rainy season and inflation are her business challenges.    She gets her goods from Kamalo Village and inside Makeni city.  She always travels twice a month by public vehicle to the village for her goods.    She is very hardworking, honest and determined.    She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for  25 bags of groundnuts for her business.

loans.name: Herlinda

texts.es: Herlinda tiene  55 años, es separada  y en la actualidad vive sola en su casa que es propia. DesD. su juventud aprendió todo lo concerniente a la costura y desD. hace 20 años consolidó su negocio, especializándose en la elaboración D. mandiles y faldas típicas D. su localidad. Esta iniciativa fue impulsada por la necesidad  D. generarse ingresos económicos puesto que sufrió con el abandono D. su esposo y tenía que afrontar y ver la manera D. mantener a sus 2 hijos. En el tiempo que ha transcurrido, ha logrado tener buenos beneficios D. su trabajo y su perseverancia la ha mantenido para superar dificultades como el robo D. su taller D. costura, que se encontraba en su misma casa. Hoy tiene su taller implementado, además cuenta con dos personas que la apoyan  en la costura. Mira con mucho optimismo su futuro y desea en adelante incrementar aún más su producción y tener maquinaria más sofisticada en su taller. Se entero D. MFP por medio D. un aviso que llegó a sus manos, solicitó información sobre las condiciones D. crédito las cuales a su parecer son convenientes para afrontarlos. El dinero que solicita, será destinado en la compra D. telas y conos D. hilos D. diversos colores.
texts.en:
Herlinda is 55 years old; she is separated and currently lives alone in her home, which she owns.  Since she was young, she has learned everything about sewing, and for the last 20 years she has had her own business specializing in the making the aprons and skirts that are typical of the area.  This initiative was propelled by her need to earn financial income after she suffered the abandonment of her husband.  Shehad to face up to it and find a way to proviD. for her two children. 

In the time that has passed since then, she has achieved positive benefits from her work.  Her perseverance has kept her going to overcome difficulties such as the theft of sewing from her workshop, which happened to her in this same house.  Today she has her workshop, and also has two people who help her with the sewing.  She looks to the future with much optimism, and wants to continue moving forward in increasing her production and getting more sophisticated machinery for her workshop.

She heard about MFP through an announcement that came her way; she requested information about the loan conditions, which in her opinion are suitable for her to meet.  The money that she is requesting will be directed for the purchase of fabrics and cones of threads in various colors.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and threads in various colors.

loans.name: Hernan

texts.es:
Hernán a sus 33 años de vida ha forjado una economía solida.  En la actualidad vive solo en la casa que heredó de sus padres.

Cuando era niño sus padres, fueron quienes forjaron en él los valores de la responsabilidad y puntualidad, cualidades que le ayudaron en su vida diaria y le permitió administrar adecuadamente sus ganancias, producto de su esfuerzo. Trabaja de manera dependiente como chofer en una empresa minera pero no descuido la tarea primordial desde su niñez, pues con sus ahorros compró vacas lecheras que actualmente están al cuidado de una persona que ha contratado exclusivamente para atender a estos animales, para el ordeño y rendir cuentas de las ventas diarias de leche que realiza. Pero en sus días libres se dedica de manera exclusiva en la atención de su establo, para mantener bien alimentados a sus animales, asimismo siembra pastizales para tener siempre forraje para sus vacas.  Hernán tiene sueños de superación y de tener un establo más grande que le permita producir cantidades considerables de leche, y así lograr mejorar su calidad de vida. Decidió trabajar con MFP por medio de una invitación personal que recibió y no tardo en averiguar las condiciones de crédito a las cuales consideró ventajosas para su negocio. Con el dinero podrá comprarse un carro, tiene de sus ahorros una parte del precio original del vehículo usado que pretende comprar y con este préstamo completara la parte que le falta.
texts.en:
Hernán, at 33 years old, has built himself a stable economic foundation.  Currently, he lives alone in the house he inherited from his parents.

When he was a boy, it was his parents who forged in him the values of responsibility and punctuality, qualities that have helped him in his daily life and have permited him to adequately administer his profits, the product of his hard work.  He is dependent upon his work as a driver for a mining business, but he hasn't neglected the fundamental work of his childhood.  With his savings, he purchased dairy cows that are currently in the care of a person he has hired to exclusively attend to these animals, milking them and managing the accounts of the daily milk sales.  However, on his days off, he dedicates his wholehearted attention to his stable, in order to maintain well fed animals.  Likewise, he sows pasturelands so that he always has fodder for his cows. 

Hernán has dreams of success and of having a larger stable that would allow him to produce considerably greater quantities of milk, and thus, achieve an improved quality of life.  He decided to work with MFP by means of a personal invitation that he received and he didn't delay in verifying the loan conditions, which he considered advantageous for his business.  With the loan, he will be able to purchase a vehicle.  From his savings, he has already paid a part of the original price of the used vehicle he intends to buy and with this loan, he will complete the rest of the payment.

loans.use: to complete the payment of a vehicle he uses to transport his animals.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for 15 piles of wood and 85 gallons of Masankay palm oil.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María  tiene 38 años, es separada y vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos en casa de sus suegros. Desde hace 7 años se dedica a la ganadería y la agricultura, asimismo cultiva pastos para alimentar a sus animales y también siembra maíz, producto que comercializa de manera periódica. Pero la fuente de ingresos más importante está en la venta de diaria de leche, extraída de las 3 vacas que posee. Por el tiempo de experiencia que tiene trabajando en esta actividad  se ha dado cuenta que es muy importante  atender en buenas condiciones a sus animales sobre todo sus vacas porque de ello depende que puedan producir la leche necesaria que vende. Con el tiempo ha implementado su establo, sin embargo le es muy necesario mejorar la infraestructura de su establo porque se acerca la época de invierno y es donde más dificultades se presentan si se trata de mantener limpio su establo. Por tal motivo decidió buscar opciones de financiamiento que le permita concretar sus planes en mente, es en ahí que decidió trabajar con MFP ya que vio que es una buena opción cuyas cuotas están a su alcance. Y con el dinero que reciba comprará arena y bolsas de cemento, también contratará mano de obra que le servirá para colocar piso de concreto en su estalo que mejorará considerablemente la atención de sus animales.
texts.en:
María is 38 years old; she is separated and lives with her two children in her in-laws' house.  For the last seven years, she has been working with livestock and agriculture.  She also grows pastureland for feeding her animals, and in addition grows corn, a product that she sells periodically.  However, her most important source of income is selling dairy milk, obtained from her three cows.

During the time that she has been doing this work, she has found that it is very important to provide good conditions for her animals, especially her cows as she depends on them to be able to produce the milk she needs to sell.  Over time, she has built a cowshed.  However, it is now very necessary for her to improve the infrastructure of the cowshed, because she is coming up to the winter season, and this poses many difficulties if she is to keep the cowshed clean.  It is for this reason that she decided to look for financing options that will allow her to put her plans into practice, and so she decided to work with MFP as she saw it was a good option with repayments that were within her reach.  

With the money that she is receiving, she will buy sand and bags of cement.  She will also hire workmen to put down a concrete floor in her cowshed, which will considerably improve the care of her animals.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and hire workmen to put a floor in her cowshed.

loans.name: Mencia

texts.es: Mencia a sus 38 años vive en  compañía de su esposo y sus 4 hijos en una casa alquilada. Siempre tuvo buena sazón y habilidad para la cocina por lo que vio la mejor opción de ingresos para su familia, mediante la venta de comida al paso. En ella vende platos típicos de su tierra, como el anticucho. Su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la esquina de su casa, actividad que lo realiza desde hace 4 años. Ella considera como una buena opción de desarrollo que la ayudó en tiempos de necesidad económica y que actualmente la ayuda a sostener  a sus hijos. Por ello espera comprar nuevos implementos que la ayudarán a vender con mayor  frecuencia  sus platillos. Es su tercera oportunidad  que tiene un crédito con MFP, en todo este tiempo ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos por lo que continua  realizando sus esfuerzos para continuar adelante. Con el dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de insumos y productos para la preparación de sus comidas.
texts.en: At the age of 38, Mencia lives with her husband and 4 children in a rented home. She has always had a talent for cooking flavourful dishes, so she thought that this was the best option for making an income for her family: selling food to passersby. She sells typical dishes from her home, such as anticucho [grilled skewered meat, often marinated in vinegar and spices and with a boiled potato or bread on the end of the skewer]. Her business is located around the corner from her house, and she has had the business for four years. She thinks that it is a good option for development and it has helped her in times of economic need. It currently helps her to sustain her children. For this reason she wants to purchase new supplies to allow her to sell her dishes more frequently. This is her third loan with MFP, and throughout her time with MFP she has proven to be punctual with her payments because she continues to work hard to get ahead. With the money that she is requesting, she will invest in the purchase of supplies and products for making her food.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and products for making food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay the subscription fees to his service provider and buy cartons of beer, stout and soft drinks.

loans.name: Fayia

texts.en:
This is 39 year-old Fayia.  He is a widower, and has 1 child, aged 10.  He has no additional dependents. In 2006, Fayia established his soft drinks and mobile phone top-up voucher business. He began his business because he wanted to be self employed and get a reliable source of income to provide livelihood for his family. Working 7 days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about Le 900,000 every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,500,000.  Fayia needs a loan in order to buy cartons of beer, stout and mobile phone top-up vouchers. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000.  In the future, Fayia plans to give his child a quality education and build a house.   He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more cartons of beer and stout and mobile phone top-up vouchers for his business

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel tiene 44 años, es una mujer luchadora que vive con sus 2 hijos en su casa propia. En la búsqueda de oportunidades para generarse ingresos ha desarrollado varias actividades de las que actualmente se dedica a brindar el servicio de lavado de ropa y a la vez en la venta de manualidades que ella misma lo elabora. Aprovecha cada amistad que tiene, para captarlos como clientes y ofrecerles dichas manualidades. Pero el servicio de lavado de ropa,  es su negocio más estable, pues su filosofía de trabajo siempre ha consistido el hacer un trabajo con excelencia y esto le permite ganar la confianza de sus clientes que a su vez recomiendan a otras personas. Por tanto desea abastecerse de materiales como detergente y otros productos que es para el lavado de ropa. Considera que MFP es su mejor aliado cuando se trata de financiamiento de su negocio y se siente muy tranquila al saber que se ha ganado la confianza por tener un historial crediticio con record de puntualidad por 8 veces, siendo esta la novena en el pago de sus cuentas. Seguirá esforzándose para continuar de esta manera y en esta ocasión el dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de objetos hecho manualmente para el uso del hogar.
texts.en:
Isabel is 44 years old, and she is a tenacious woman.  She lives with her two children in her own house.  While searching for opportunities to generate income, she has developed various business activities.  She currently provides laundry services, and at the same time she sells handicrafts that she makes.

She makes the most of each friend that she has to get more customers and to offer them her handicrafts.  However, her business of washing clothes is her more stable business.  Her work philosophy has always consisted of doing an excellent job.  This allows her to win her customers’  trust, and they recommend her to other people.

Therefore, she wants to stock up on materials like detergent and other products for washing clothes.  She considers MFP to be her best ally when it comes to financing her business.  She feels very at ease knowing that she has won their trust by having a good loan history.  She has a record of being punctual eight times as this is the ninth time that she makes her payments.

She will keep putting forth effort to continue in this manner.  This time the requested money is to buy material to make handicrafts to use in the home.

loans.use: to buy materials to make handicrafts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To renovate her restaurant, buy more chairs for her customers, drinks and some food items.

loans.name: Myriam

texts.es: Myriam tiene 46 años, vive con sus 2 hijos en casa de su padre y son su razón de vivir. Su emprendimiento de hace 17 años se ha mantenido hasta hoy, en su casa ha instalado su fuente de soda porque se ubica al frente de un parque muy transitada, cual es una ventaja para su negocio. Es así que todos los días se dedica a su negocio, y en la cocina ha contratado a un chef que prepara comidas al paso, del mismo modo vender también toda clase de bebidas gasificadas de acuerdo al pedido y demanda de su clientela. Hace 3 años tomó una decisión importante para su negocio, pues la remodeló por lo que tuvo un costo muy alto que la beneficio, porque poco a poco más clientela acude a su establecimiento  sobre todo los fines  de semana, convirtiéndose en una buena opción de esparcimiento y entretenimiento, tiene proyectos de seguir mejorando e implementando su negocio por lo que continuará esforzándose. Desde que accedió a los créditos de MFP de manera grupal de las cuales ha demostrado su responsabilidad  y liderazgo en su grupo como buen ejemplo de inversión en 8  veces que solicita el crédito. Y en esta oportunidad invertirá el dinero que solicita en la compra de una cocina industrial que le es muy necesario en su negocio.
texts.en:
Myriam, age 46, lives with her two children in her father’s house.  They are her reason for living.  Her business, which she has had for 17 years so far, is a soda fountain that she has installed at her house.  It is located in front of a heavily traveled park, which is an advantage for her business.

She devotes herself to her business every day.  She has hired a chef to work in the kitchen and prepare fast food.  She also sells all types of carbonated drinks according to customer requests and demand.

Three years ago she made an important decision about her business.  She remodeled it, and the cost was very high.  It was beneficial because little by little more customers come to her establishment, especially on the week-ends.  It has become a good option for leisure time and entertainment.

She has projects to continue improving and implementing in her business.  Therefore, she will continue her efforts.  Since she has had the group loans from MFP she has demonstrated her responsibility and leadership in her group.  She has served as a good investment example in the eight times she has requested a loan.

This time she will use the money from the loan to buy an industrial stove, which she really needs in her business.

loans.use: to buy an industrial stove.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel es una joven de 24 años, vive con su madre en su casa que es propia. Desde hace 4 años se dedica a brindar el servicio de lavandería, su madre le enseñó este oficio y de esa manera lavaban docenas de ropa, pero con el tiempo  debilitaban su salud. Desde entonces decidió comprarse una maquina lavadora  en la que actualmente sigue funcionando y que gracias  a este implementó ofrece  este servicio de lavado y puede ahorrar tiempo, energías y abastecerse más para seguir ofreciendo su servicio con calidad. Tiene bastante demanda de su servicio de lavado por lo que le es muy necesario tener otra maquina lavadora. Considera que los créditos de las que ha sido participe de manera grupal con MFP fue una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado para mejorar su actividad económica y es por esta razón que continuará  trabajando por décima vez con los préstamos porque  considera que son muy necesarios para el desarrollo de su negocio. El dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de una maquina lavadora de mayor capacidad.
texts.en: Raquel is a young 24-year-old woman. She lives with her mother in their own home. For four years she has provided a laundry service. Her mother taught her this work and they used to wash a lot of laundry, but with the passing of time her health deteriorated. So, Raquel decided to buy herself a washing machine. It has allowed her business to keep afloat, and thanks to this piece of equipment she can offer a laundry service and save time and energy, and be better equipped in order to continue offering a quality service. Her laundry service is in such high demand that she is in great need of another washing machine. She considers the group loans in which she has taken part through MFP to be some of the best decisions she has made to improve her business, and for this reason she will continue working with them, taking out her tenth loan, because she considers these loans to be very necessary for the development of her business. She will invest the requested loan in the purchase of a higher capacity washing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a washing machine.

loans.name: Rutt

texts.es: Rutt tiene 38 años, vive en casa de una familiar con sus 2 hijos. Ante la necesidad de tener un ingreso económico, tuvo información por una amiga sobre la venta de cosméticos por catalogo y es así como se inscribió para  recibir dichos productos y venderlos. En un inicio fue muy duro,  porque tenía que ir de casa en casa para conseguir clientes y seleccionar aquellos confiables para la venta de sus productos. Ya han pasado 7 años desde aquel entonces y ahora cuenta con un capital considerable que le permitió mantenerse en su negocio, tiene una vitrina  en su casa donde  pude  mostrar a sus clientes la variedad de productos de belleza de marcas reconocidas en su medio y de esa manera atraer mas ventas. Disfruta de su trabajo que realiza porque tiene habilidad para las ventas y su deseo es incrementar más su capital. Recibió la invitación de una de sus vecinas y amiga  para formar parte del grupo solidario que actualmente integra por medio de MFP, ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos y se ha ganado la confianza de sus demás compañeros  para seguir accediendo a  créditos futuros, por décima oportunidad. En esta ocasión su crédito será invertido en la compra de más mercadería y así aprovechar la venta por temporada de fiestas de su país.
texts.en: Rutt is 38 and lives in the home of a family member with her 2 children. Faced with the need to have an income, she received information from a friend about selling cosmetics through a catalogue. This is how she signed up to receive these products and sell them. In the beginning it was very hard for her, because she had to go door to door to get customers and select trustworthy people to sell her products to. Seven years have passed since then and she now has considerable working capital which allows her to maintain her business. She has a display case in her home where she can show her clients the variety of beauty products from known brands that she has. This way, she brings in more sales. She enjoys her work because she has a knack for sales. She wants to expand her capital even more. Her neighbours and a friend invited her to join the solidarity group that she is currently part of in MFP. She has proven to be punctual in her payments and has gained the confidence of her peers so she can continue to access future loans. This is her tenth opportunity. This time, her loan will be invested in the purchase of more merchandise in order to sell and take advantage of the party season in her country.

loans.use: to purchase more beauty products.

loans.name: Bertila

texts.es: Bertila tiene 52 años, radica desde hace varios años en la ciudad de Huancayo con su esposo y el menor de sus 4 hijos. En su niñez su madre le enseñó a tejer y en la actualidad es una de las fuentes de ingreso importante en su familia. Teje a mano y sus esenciales herramientas son sus palitos y la lana, en las cuales  siempre  esta  aprovechando el tiempo para tejer y producir  diversas prendas de vestir como: chompas, chalinas, gorros. Asimismo la elaboración de estos tejidos también depende de sus clientes, pro que son ellos, quienes le indican el color, la calidad de lana y el punto de tejido que requieren para su prenda. Para Bertila realizar esta actividad es una gran distracción y de su agrado porque lo disfruta, además que obtiene ganancias, sin embargo también sabe que le es necesario aumentar su producción y seguir innovando, esto será su prioridad de trabajo. Una de sus hijos le recomendó trabajar con MFP si de solicitar créditos se trata y vio por conveniente que es lo que mas se ajusta a su necesidad por lo que solicita un crédito por segunda vez, que le permitirá abastecerse de lana al por mayor, de variados colores  y calidades, y con otra parte  desea emprender el negocio de animales de las cuales ya ha previsto su punto de compra y venta posterior.
texts.en:
Bertila is 52 years old, she has lived for several years in the city of Huancayo with her husband and the youngest of her four children.  In her childhood, her mother taught her to knit and now it is one of the main sources of income for her family.  She knits by hand, and her essential tools are her knitting needles and wool, with which she always takes advantage of time to knit and create various items of clothing such as sweaters, scarves and hats.  Her production of these knitted items also depends on her customers, because it is up to them to choose the color, the quality of the wool and the degree of knitting that they request for their clothing.

For Bertila to do this work is a big commitment, and a welcome one as she enjoys it in addition to earning income.  However, she also knows that it is necessary for her to grow her production and continue to innovate; this is going to be her priority with her work.

One of her sons recommended to her that she work with MFP for financing and she saw that it was convenient and would best meet her needs.  This is why she is requesting a loan for the second time, which will allow her to stock up on wool of various colors and quality at wholesale.  With the other part of the loan, she wants to undertake a business with animals, which she has already planned where to purchase and later sell.

loans.use: to buy wool at wholesale in a variety of colors.

loans.name: Braulio

texts.es: Braulio es un jefe de familia muy responsable,  tiene 22 años vive con su esposa y  su hija recién nacida en casa de sus padres. Tiene 3 años de trabajo junto a un carro que arrendó de su vecino, por lo que se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi y de esa manera recorre todas las calles de la ciudad transportando a los pasajeros. Esta actividad tiene mucha demanda en su ciudad  y su habilidad para conducir  y el conocimiento de las reglas de transito le favorecen en el buen desempeño de su trabajo. Es por ello que se siente muy contento y motivado en continuar adelante con miras a adquirir su propia movilidad. Fue invitado a formar parte de un grupo solidario a través de MFP y desde entonces ha podido mejorar en su negocio porque  puede tener dinero en el momento en que necesitaba de realizar mantenimiento mecánico al carro que esta a su disposición y esto significa  horas de trabajo sin interrupción y ganancias. En la actualidad es su tercera solicitud de crédito donde se compromete una vez mas a seguir siendo puntual en sus pagos. En esta oportunidad, el dinero lo invertirá en la compra de nuevos repuesto, así como en el  mantenimiento y pago de la póliza de seguro.
texts.en:
Braulio is a very responsible head of his family. He is 22-years-old and lives with his wife and newborn daughter in his parents' house. He has been working as a taxi driver for the past three years using a car he leased from a friend. He travels all the streets of the city transporting passengers. This type of work is in high demand in his city, and his driving skills and knowledge of traffic laws are favored in his work performance. That is why he feels very happy and motivated to continue improving his social mobility.

He was invited to become a member of a solidarity group through MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and since then has been able to improve his business because he has money when he needs it to perform car maintenance which allows him to work and earn income without interruptions. This is Braulio's third loan and he promises once again to make all his payments on time.This time the money will be use to buy spare parts, perform car maintenance, and pay for his insurance policy.

loans.use: to buy spare parts, keep up with mechanical maintenance, and pay for his insurance policy

loans.name: Kattia

texts.es: Kattia tiene 36 años, radica en su tierra natal, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Desde su niñez se ha dedicado a la agricultura, siembra maíz y papa, productos alimenticios que son vendidos en los mercados principales de su ciudad. En este trabajo recibe el apoyo de su madre, ya que el terreno que cultiva es su herencia y de esta manera  mejora los ingresos de su hogar. Durante todos estos años ha visto que esta actividad ha sido un gran apoyo financiero para su familia por lo que continuará sembrando sobre los terrenos que posee. Por otro lado desea  emprender un negocio en su propia casa, ya que dispone de amplios espacios como para ser un recreo bar. Ahora empezó a construir, pero necesita de más dinero para continuar y terminar la construcción. Escucho de MFP por medio de los vecinos de su barrio natal que formaban un banco comunal y se animó a formar parte de un grupo solidario para trabajar con los préstamos e invertirlos siempre en su actividad económica. Esta es su décima solicitud de crédito  y se siente muy motivada a seguir trabajando de esta forma. Con el dinero que solicita, comprará materiales de construcción para poner piso de cemento en la parte donde iniciará su nuevo negocio y con la tercera parte del dinero comprará  sacos de abono para seguir sembrando.
texts.en:
Kattia, 36, lives where she was born with her husband and three children in her own house. Since childhood she’s worked in agriculture farming corn and potatoes, food products that are sold in the city’s main markets.  Her mother helps her with this work since the lands she farms are her inheritance and this is how she improves household income.  During all these years she’s seen how this activity has been a great financial help for her family so she intends to continue farming on her land.

On the other hand, she’d like to start a home-based business since she has ample space available for a snack shop/bar.  She started construction but needs more money to continue and finish the construction.  She heard about MFP though her neighbors in the neighborhood that were forming a communal bank so she ventured to become part of the group to work with loans and invest them always in her economic activity.

This is her 10th loan request and she feels very motivated to continue working this way.  She will use the requested funds to buy building materials to install a cement floor in the area where she’s going to start her new business and with a third of the money she will buy sacks of manure to continue farming.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies and to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: Marisol  vive con su esposo y su hijo, en una casa que heredó de sus padres. Desde hace 5 años que se dedica a la crianza, engorde y venta de ganado vacuno que tiene en su establo, trabaja intensamente por varios meses y al cabo de un tiempo los vende en la feria ganadera de su ciudad. Por otro lado arrienda toros que tienen mucha demanda para el trabajo del arado, y que en épocas de siembra suelen ser muy rentable este negocio. Asimismo vende leche de sus vacas, por lo que cada mañana después de ordeñar, las alimenta y limpia su establo para mantenerlas en bien cuidadas y evitar que sufran alguna enfermedad. Su gran anhelo es tener más cantidad de animales para incrementar su  capital de trabajo. Desde que supo de los créditos que ofrece MFP determinó tener un aliado económico para concretar sus proyectos mediatos y se incorporó a un grupo de personas que hoy en día es un grupo sólido y unido, ahora solicita su crédito numero 9 de la que esta seguro en que invertirá en la de materiales de construcción que mejorará la infraestructura de su casa y su establo.
texts.en:
Marisol lives with her husband and son in a house she inherited from her parents.  For the last five years she’s been raising cattle to sell.  She keeps them in a stable and works intensely for several months and after that time sells them in her city’s livestock market.  On the other hand, she leases out bulls that are in high demand to do plowing chores and can be quite profitable during planting season.  She also sells milk from her cows so every morning after milking them she feeds them and cleans the stable to keep them well cared for and avoid their contracting any disease.  Her great wish is to have more animals to increase her working capital.

Since hearing about MFP loans she decided to have an economic ally to help her make her projects a reality.  She joined a group of people who today are a solid, united group.  She is currently asking for her 9th loan that she’s sure she’ll invest in building materials and supplies to improve the infrastructure of her house and her stable.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Musa

texts.en:
This is a 36-year-old Musa. He is married to a petty trader and has two children aged 13 and 16. In 2005, Musa established a business that sells soft drinks, beer, stout, and provisions such as milk, sugar, butter, cheese, and mayonnaise. He began his business because he realized that he would make huge profits taking advantage of the fact that there was no such a business in his community. 

Musa started by selling items in a small wooden box, moved to a kiosk and now a container which he has converted to a shop and bar. Working seven days a week and 14 hours a day, he earns about 1,050,000 Leones (SLL) every month from this business. He would like a loan in the amount of 4,500,000 SLL. 

Musa now requires a new loan in order to buy cartons of beer, stout and provisions. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL. In the future, Musa plans to buy a piece of land and educate his children to the level they wish to attain. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks, beer, stout, and provisions such as milk, sugar, butter, cheese, and mayonnaise

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemí tiene 56 años, vive en su tierra natal con su esposo en su casa propia. Trabajo desD. su niñez en las tareas del campo, porque proviene D. una humilD. familia agricultora, ahora es su principal fuente D. ingreso que junto a su esposo desD. hace 32 años siguen cultivando los terrenos que ambos heredaron D. sus padres. Ahí siembra papa, maíz y cebolla principalmente, también realiza su trabajo en la ganadería, posee vacas y toros en su establo que cada día con la ayuda D. su esposo y sus hijos las cuidas.  Manifiesta que le agrada trabajar en la ganadería porque le otorga mejores ganancias que la agricultura misma, además siempre tiene disponible la leche que producen sus vacas y del que es vendido, Por tanto ha decidió incrementar su capital D. trabajo en la compra D. más ganado vacuno. Se emtero D. MFP por medio D. sus vecinos que la invitaron a formar parte D. un grupo solidario y que actualmente es un grupo muy unido, le agrada trabajar D. esta manera porque pueD. mejorar su capital D. trabajo. Es por esta razón que el dinero que solicita, estará destinado en la compra D. sacos D. abono para su cultivo D. cebolla y pasto.
texts.en:
Noemí, 56, lives with her husband in the same place where she was born in her own house.  She’s worked in the fields since childhood because she comes from a humble family of farmers.  Now, it’s her and her husband’s main source of income; they have been working the fields they both inherited from their parents for the last 32 years.  She grows potatoes, corn and onions, primarily, but also raises livestock; she has cows and bulls in her stable that she cares for daily with help from her husband and children.  She states that she enjoys working raising animals because it produces better profits than farming.  Besides, she always has milk available to sell that her cows produce.

For this reason she’s decided to increase working capital buying more cattle.  She found out about MFP through neighbors that invited her to form part of a communal bank and which today is a very united group.  It pleases her to work this way because she can improve her working capital.  The money she’s requesting is destined to purchase sacks of manure for her onion and pasture grass crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en: Norma is 62 years old and she lives in Alindahaw, Tukuran, ZDS.  She is married with eight children. She has been engaged in various businesses. Aside from farming and pig raising, she also sells dried fish. Her husband is working on a fishing boat. She's been in the pig raising business for nine years. She's been a member of PMPC since 2008.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs

loans.name: Ramatulai

texts.en: This is 37-year-old Ramatulai.  She is divorced, and has one child who is 17 years old.  She has one additional dependent who lives with her because she is her relative and she helps with her schooling.  In 2006, Ramatulai established her slippers, clothing, shoes and soft drinks business.  She began her business because she knows that she is not well educated and her husband who used to be very helpful to her abandoned her. She found this business to be her only option to support her child and dependent. Working six days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about Le 900,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000.  Ramatulai requires a loan in order to improve her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000.  In the future, Ramatulai plans to educate her daughter to the university level. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more clothing, slippers and drinks for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to service his car and pay for the insurance policy.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia es una mujer trabajadora y muy creativa y muy esforzada, tiene 39 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en una casa alquilada. Tiene su restaurante desde 5 años y medio, sus hijos la animaron a tener su negocio aprovechando de la buena sazón que tiene en cada plato que prepara. Este negocio actualmente lo desarrolla en un local que alquiló y se ubica en una zona muy comercial. Es así que todos los días atiende su restaurante, sus hijos la ayudan en la atención, de esta manera logra vender buena cantidad de platos al día que le permite tener ganancias satisfactoria. Afirma que cada día le agrada trabajar en este negocio porque le permite alimentar bien a su familia y  desarrollar lo que le apasiona como es la cocina, es por esta razón que continuará trabajando en este rubro con el objetivo de ser un restaurante de prestigio. Desde que decidió trabajar con MFP desde hace varios años no ha dejado de responder adecuadamente en el pago de cada cuota de manera puntual, razón por la cual sigue accediendo a estos préstamos porque se ha ganado la confianza cuyo respaldo es su responsabilidad. En esta ocasión es su oportunidad 15 de solicitud de crédito de manera grupal. Con el dinero que solicita, se abastecerá comprando al por mayor los ingredientes básicos en la preparación de comida como: arroz, azúcar y menestras.
texts.en:
Alicia is a very hardworking, creative and dedicated woman. She is 39 and lives with her husband and 3 children in a rented house. She has had her restaurant for five and a half years. Her children encouraged her to open her business and capitalize on her wonderful cooking skills. 

Her business is currently operated in a rented space and is located in a very commercial area. There she runs her restaurant every day, with her children’s help, and is able to sell a large enough number of meals a day to earn a satisfactory income. She says that every day she is grateful to work in this business because it enables her to provide well for her family and to do what she is passionate about, which is to cook. For this reason, she plans to continue working in this field with the goal of becoming a restaurant of renown.

Since she has been working with MFP for the past several years, she has always made her payments on time and therefore continues taking out these loans because she has gained the confidence that comes from meeting her obligations. At present, this is her 15th loan request as part of a group. With this loan, she will stock up, buying basic supplies wholesale that she uses to prepare her dishes, such as rice, sugar and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and vegetables.

loans.name: Cresencia

texts.es: Cresencia tiene 63 años, radica en Huancayo al lado de su esposo desde hace más de 20 años en su casa que es propia. Desde su juventud se ha dedicado a la agricultura  de las cuales  siempre ha cultivado papa y maíz principalmente. En muchas ocasiones  por las condiciones climáticas y la inestabilidad de los precios en el mercado le perjudicó en su economía. Fue así que por recomendación de unos familiares decidió cultivar flores y criar vacas en su establo; consiguió en el municipio de su municipalidad un puesto de ventas del mercado de su ciudad y desde entonces vende sus propias cosechas, Desde entonces sus ventas se han incrementó poco a poco y tiene mayores márgenes de ganancias porque no tiene intermediario, pues es productora y comerciante. Su esposo también trabaja junto con ella en estas tareas ya que con tantos años de matrimonio han formado bien a sus 4 hijos que ahora son personas mayores. Por el crecimiento de sus ventas le es muy necesario producir más flores por lo que necesita tener más capital para sembrar. Para Crecencia es su tercera solicitud de crédito que tiene, las otras 2 anteriores es donde ha demostrado ser puntual en sus pagos y prudente en la buena inversión que realizó para el crecimiento de su negocio. En esta ocasión, el dinero que solicita, lo destinará en la compra de semillas de flores y sacos de abono.
texts.en:
Cresencia is 63 years old, and has lived in Huancayo with her husband for more than 20 years in her own house. Since her youth she has done agricultural work, primarily growing potatoes and corn. On many occasions, weather conditions and instability in market prices have been detrimental to her finances. For this reason, and on the recommendation of some of her relatives, she decided to grow flowers and raise cows in her stable. 

From the government office of her municipality, she got a sales stall at her city's market, and from then on she sold her own harvests. Since then her sales have increased little by little and she has a larger profit margin because there is no middle man, since she is the producer and vendor. Her husband also works with her in these labors. Through their many years of marriage, they have raised 4 children who are all grown.

Due to the increase in her sales, she needs to produce more flowers, and for this she needs more capital for planting. This is Cresencia's third loan request. Through the previous 2 she has shown herself to be punctual in her payments and prudent in her investments for the growth of her business. In this case, the money she requests will be used to purchase flower seeds and sacks of manure.

loans.use: to purchase flower seeds and sacks of manure

loans.name: Nemesia

texts.es: Nemesia tiene 49 años, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa que es propia. Se dedica desde hace 5 años a la venta de verduras en un mercado de su barrio, es así que todos los días hasta el medio día vende en su puesto, ya que desde muy temprano se levanta para adquirir las verduras de los mayoristas que traen de los campos, por lo que siempre son frescos y de calidad. Disfruta del trabajo que realiza porque aprendió muchas lecciones de vida, sobre todo para ser buena en las ventas y atraer a más clientela que consuma los productos que ofrece, por tanto espera tener un puesto de ventas más amplia y abastecerle de  mayor variedad de verduras. Tiene dentro de su historial crediticio buen tiempo trabajando con MFP, recuerda que fue invitada por una de sus vecinas para  solicitar créditos de manera grupal y esta es la oportunidad 11 que nuevamente renueva su compromiso de responsabilidad. Para esta ocasión el dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería y de esa manera aumentar su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Nemesia is 49 years old and lives with her husband and 3 children in her own house. For 5 years she has sold vegetables at a market in her neighborhood. She spends every day until mid-day selling at her stall, rising very early to get the vegetables from the wholesalers who bring them from the fields, so that her produce is always fresh and high quality. 

She enjoys the work she does because she has learned many life lessons, especially how to be a good salesperson and attract more customers for her products, through which she hopes to have a larger stall and carry a greater variety of vegetables. 

Her credit history includes a long time working with MFP. She recalls that the first time she was invited by one of her neighbors to be part of a group loan, and this is now her 11th loan cycle. At this time, she will invest the money she is requesting in the purchase of merchandise, thus increasing her working capital.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables for her business.

loans.name: Hawanatu

texts.en: This is 41-year-old Hawanatu.  She is married and has three children aged 2, 11 and 16 years. In 1990, Hawanatu established her slippers and clothing business. She inherited this business from her aunt who brought her up because she never went to school. This business is my only means of livelihood, said Hawanatu. Working 7 days a week and 11 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,000,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Hawanatu requires a loan in order to buy different kinds of clothing and slippers for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Hawanatu plans to educate her children to the university level and build a house for her family. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more plastic slippers and clothing for her business

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia es una madre de familia muy trabajadora, es madre de 4 hijos y vive con su esposa en su casa que es propia. Tiene 6 años de experiencia en la compra y venta de animales. Para ello adquiere los animales a un bajo precio y en un edad menor de vida, así los cría y alimenta para cuando llegan a un peso exacto son vendidos en las ferias ganaderas de su localidad. Su esposos también es participe de este negocio, que se ha convertido en una fuente importante de ingresos con el que puede  sostener a su familia. Paralelamente a este negocio también vende comida  por las tardes  de manera ambulante. Se siente muy animada por todos los logros que ha cosechado a lo largo del desempeño de su actividad por lo que continuará trabajando con miras a  tener más cabezas de ganado. Trabaja en los créditos grupales con MFP desde hace varios años, fue invitada a formar parte del grupo solidario que hoy integra y se ha convertido en una socia confiable para las demás personas. 
El dinero que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de más animales y aprovechar esta temporada de festividades en su localidad donde hay mayor demanda de ellos.
texts.en:
Julia is the hardworking mother of 4 children and lives with her husband in her own house. She has 6 years' experience buying and selling animals. She buys the animals very young at a low price, and raises and feeds them. When they reach a certain weight they are sold in the cattle markets in her area. 

Her husband also helps in the business, which has become an important source of income to support her family. Along with this business, she also sells food in the afternoons as a street vendor. She is very happy about all the success she has achieved during her time at this work, so she will continue working with her sights set on having more heads of cattle. 

She has been part of group loans with MFP for several years. She was invited to be a part of the supportive group that she is a member of today, and she has become a member that the rest can depend on. The money she requests will be invested in purchasing more animals so she can make the most of this festival season in her area while there is a greater demand.

loans.use: to purchase more animals

loans.name: Segundina

texts.es: Segundina es una mujer ejemplar D. 53 años, que lamentablemente se divorció D. su pareja Marino, con quien tuvo cuatro hijos D. los cuales sólo vive con José en su casa propia ubicado en la ciudad D. San Ramón (selva central peruana). Ella se siente feliz; desD. hace 18 años que ama sus plantas D. frutas cítricas, plátanos y papaya  a las cuales se ha dedicado todo este tiempo, proporcionándole el cuidado necesario que requiere por eso confiesa que le encanta caminar a lo largo y ancho D. sus tierras porque toda la actividad agrícola le hace sentir viva, “sin mis cosechas no hubiera podido tener nada, D. que hubiera comido, educado a mis hijos, juntando dinero me compré mi casita donD. además crío cuyes para comercializar y para mi consumo por eso digo con la bendición D. Dios y porque eh sabido trabajar nada me ha faltado”, afirma Segundina, al mismo tiempo que comenta que sus ingresos son seguros cada 15 días ya que cosecha plátanos con lo que cubre los gastos D. los productos D. primera necesidad que requiere, mientras las ganancias D. las naranjas, mandarinas y papaya son para ahorrar y solventar alguna eventualidad que se presente más adelante. El sueño que tiene ella, con el tiempo es tener su propio dinero (capital), para plantar nuevos frutos en los terrenos agrícolas que posee. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Gotitas D. rocío” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donD. está convencida D. cumplir con los pagos del su cuota pues ya conoce la metodología D. trabajo en su banco comunal, además agradece al apoyo brindado. Segundina D. recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra D. fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Segundina is an exemplary 53-year-old woman who sadly was divorced from her husband, Marino, with whom she had four children.  Only one of them, José, lives with her in her own house located in the city of San Ramón (Peruvian Central Jungle).  

She feels happy.  For the last 18 years she’s loved her citrus fruit plants, bananas and papayas that she’s dedicated all this time to providing the necessary care.  She confesses that she loves walking along her entire field because all agricultural activity makes her feel alive.  Segundina affirms:  “Without my crops I wouldn’t have been able to have anything, nothing to eat nor been able to educate my children.  Saving money I was able to build my little house where I raise guinea pigs to sell and for my own consumption.  This is why I say that with God’s blessings and because I’ve known how to work I’ve lacked nothing.”

She also affirms that her income is secure because she harvests bananas every two weeks and that covers her basic needs while profits from oranges, mandarins and papaya are for savings and to cover any unexpected expense that might crop up later.

Her dream is eventually to have her own money (capital) to plant new crops in the fields she owns.  She belongs to the “Gotitas D. Rocío” (Little Dewdrops) and this is her sixth MFP loan where she’s convinced that she’ll make her installment payments since she is well aware of her communal bank’s method of operation.  In addition, she gives thanks for the support provided.  If Segundina were to receive your support, she will use the requested money to buy natural fertilizers to spread among her plants.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Zaida

texts.es: Zaida es una mujer emprendedora y muy alegre de 27 años, que vive en su casa propia con su hermana menor Leyla y su sobrino, a los que cuida en la ciudad de San Ramón (selva central peruana). Desde hace 11 años ella se dedica a la venta de pescado en un puesto en el mercado modelo de su ciudad (San Ramón), con la ayuda de su padre quien le enseñó el oficio, también 3 veces a la semana vende carne de res, lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es filetear la carne de toro para parrilladas (carne de res aderezado con ají especial a la plancha), asimismo le desagrada estar en contacto permanente con el agua ya que le provoca dolores en los huesos. Como en el tiempo ella ambiciona instalar una carnicería; hace poco, con las ganancias de sus ventas compró una máquina cortadora, moledora y una moto carro que alquila diario a 20 soles. Le gusta mucho el negocio, pues le brinda una ganancia de 100 a 150 nuevos soles diarios, con los que espera salir adelante y lograr su principal ambición. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Gotitas de rocío” y este es el décimo crédito con MFP, donde está orgullosa de trabajar con los integrantes de su banco comunal porque ella es una de las fundadoras que les enseñó a laborar con esmero y puntualidad. Zaida de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de porcinos vivos que luego de matarlos repartirá a los negociantes de carne en grandes cantidades.
texts.en:
Zaida is an enterprising, very cheerful 27-year-old woman who lives in her own house with her younger sister, Leyla, and her nephew, that she cares for in the city of San Ramón (Peruvian Central Jungle).  

For the last 11 years she’s been selling fish in a stand she has in the Modelo market in her city (San Ramón) with help from her father who taught her the occupation.  Also, three times a week she sells beef.  What she most enjoys about her work is butchering the beef for “parrilladas” (grilled beef seasoned with special chili sauce).  What she dislikes is constantly being in contact with water which causes bone pain.  Because she’d like to eventually open a butcher shop she recently used some savings from her sales to buy a slicer, a grinder and a car that she leases out for 20 soles a day.  She likes the business very much because it produces an average daily profit of 100-150 soles that she hopes to use to get ahead and reach her main objective.


She’s a member of the “Gotitas de Rocío” (Little Dewdrops) communal bank and this is the 10th MFP loan where she’s proud to work with her communal bank fellow members because she’s one of the founders that taught them how to work with dedication and punctuality.  If Zaida were to receive your support she will invest the requested money to purchase live pigs to slaughter later on and sell pork to merchants in large quantities.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
This is 53-year-old Mohamed. He is married and has three children aged 27, 21 and 17. He has two additional dependents who live with him because they assist him with his business. 

Mohamed inherited this business from his parents. Since his late father only taught him how to bake bread, he has successfully managed this business to provide a livelihood for his family for the past 20 years. Mohamed never attended school but he is the most popular baker in his community. Working seven days a week and 11 hours a day, he earns about 1,200,000 Leones (SLL) every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of 5,000,000 SLL. He will use it to buy bread flour, 20 bags at 180,000 SLL, and wood for 500,000 SLL. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 300,000 SLL. In the future, Mohamed plans to expand his wife's business, educate his children, and build a house for his family. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy bread flour and wood for his bakery

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es: Arturo, de 40 años, es un hombre trabajador. Vive en la casa junto a Martha, su esposa desde hace 3 años. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Jazmín  y Génesis a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Alianza. Su principal trabajo es la enseñanza a personas de la tercera edad, que son analfabetos a los cuales enseña a escribir y leer. Está actividad le proporciona ingresos económicos que son pagados por el estado peruano. Pero en sus tiempos libres se dedica al trabajo en sus terrenos de cultivo. Todas las mañanas, junto a los primeros rayos de sol, camina hasta sus chacras de café, plátano, palta y achiote, las  cuales están a una hora aproximadamente. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar sus tierras y lo hace con mucho esmero, lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es trabajar en 2 lugares a la vez, pues no se abastece de tiempo. Para más adelante, espera comprar nuevas tierras para ampliar sus cultivos, ya que solo posee una hectárea de extensión. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Alianza al progreso” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente, pues es una regla de su banco comunal. Además agradece al apoyo brindado. Arturo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 800 mamones (plantitas de plátanos), que trasplantará en sus terrenos agrícolas y el resto de dinero lo invertirá en los gastos de cultivo.
texts.en:
Arturo, 40, is a hardworking man.  He lives at home with Martha, his wife of three years.  They have two children: Jazmín and Génesis that they care for in their own home located in the indigenous community of Alianza.  His main job is teaching illiterate senior citizens to read and write.  This activity provides him income since it’s paid for by the Peruvian State. 

In his spare time, though, he works on his farmland.  Every morning with the sun’s first rays he heads out to his coffee, banana, avocado and achiote fields which are located about an hour away.  What he most enjoys about his work is tilling the soil, something he does with much dedication.  He’s been in this line of work for 20 years and considers the most difficult part having to work in two places at the same time because there's never enough time.  For later on, he plans to buy new land to expand his crops because he currently has only one hectare.

He belongs to the “Alianza al Progreso” (Alianza toward Progress) communal bank and this is the second MFP loan where he knows that he has to make his installment payments on time because that’s a rule of his communal bank.  Also, he gives thanks for the support received.  If Arturo were to receive your support, he’ll use the requested money to buy 800 banana seedlings that he’ll transplant in his fields.  He’ll use the rest of the money to cover crop maintenance costs.

loans.use: to buy 800 banana plants.

loans.name: Francisco
